languages.text: "Объяснять подобное тебе, элантах, равно что петь птицам о красоте глубинных вод и кораллового леса. Твое ограниченное представление о мире едва ли вместит в сознании изгибы бесконечных шпилей из {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}психокости{/g}, сладостный дурман цветущего сада под кристаллическим куполом или хрустальное журчание ручья, пронзающего насквозь мир. И все это на одном корабле, что сияет подобно очередной звезде на бархатном полотне космоса".

traits.locale_text: "Объяснять подобное тебе, элантах, равно что петь птицам о красоте глубинных вод и кораллового леса. Твое ограниченное представление о мире едва ли вместит в сознании изгибы бесконечных шпилей из {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}психокости{/g}, сладостный дурман цветущего сада под кристаллическим куполом или хрустальное журчание ручья, пронзающего насквозь мир. И все это на одном корабле, что сияет подобно очередной звезде на бархатном полотне космоса".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."
languages.original_text: "Объяснять подобное тебе, элантах, равно что петь птицам о красоте глубинных вод и кораллового леса. И все это на одном корабле, что сияет подобно очередной звезде на бархатном полотне космоса".

traits.locale_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the endless shapely curves of the {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}Wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal or the silver babbling of a brook running across the whole world. All of it contained in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet fabric of space."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “向你解释方舟世界，就好像对鸟儿颂唱深海与珊瑚的美丽，外界人。你头脑中对世界的理解很有限，无法容纳无尽的{g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}灵骨{/g}尖塔，水晶穹顶下花园绽放的醉人芬芳，或是贯穿整个世界的银色小溪发出的潺潺流水声。这一切在我们的飞船上应有尽有。在虚空天鹅绒般的帷幕上，方舟世界就像恒星一样耀眼。”
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: “向你解释方舟世界，就好像对鸟儿颂唱深海与珊瑚的美丽，外界人。你头脑中对世界的理解很有限，无法容纳无尽的{g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}灵骨{/g}尖塔，水晶穹顶下花园绽放的醉人芬芳，或是贯穿整个世界的银色小溪发出的潺潺流水声。这一切在我们的飞船上应有尽有。在虚空天鹅绒般的帷幕上，方舟世界就像恒星一样耀眼。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless wraithbone spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

languages.text: «Explicártelo es como cantar un himno a la belleza de las aguas profundas y los bosques de coral a un pájaro, elantach. La comprensión limitada del mundo que puede abarcar tu mente es incapaz de procesar los contornos de las infinitas agujas de {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}hueso espectral{/g}, el aroma intoxicante de un jardín floreciente bajo su cúpula de cristal o el balbuceo argénteo de un arroyo que atraviesa el mundo entero. Y todo esto está encapsulado en un único navío que refulge como una estrella en las cortinas de terciopelo del vacío».
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: «Explicártelo es como cantar un himno a la belleza de las aguas profundas y los bosques de coral a un pájaro, elantach. La comprensión limitada del mundo que puede abarcar tu mente es incapaz de procesar los contornos de las infinitas agujas de {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}hueso espectral{/g}, el aroma intoxicante de un jardín floreciente bajo su cúpula de cristal o el balbuceo argénteo de un arroyo que atraviesa el mundo entero. Y todo esto está encapsulado en un único navío que refulge como una estrella en las cortinas de terciopelo del vacío».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それを説明するのは、深海やサンゴの森の美しさを鳥に賛歌するようなものだ、エランタ。お前の頭で理解できる世界は限られている。どこまでも続く{g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}幽骨{/g}の尖塔の輪郭や、クリスタルのドームの下で咲き乱れる庭園の香りや、惑星中を流れる小川の銀色のせせらぎを、お前はほとんどといっていいほど受け入れることはできないだろう。そしてこれらすべてが虚空のベルベットのドレープに、星のように輝くひとつの器に封じ込められているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: 「それを説明するのは、深海やサンゴの森の美しさを鳥に賛歌するようなものだ、エランタ。お前の頭で理解できる世界は限られている。どこまでも続く{g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}幽骨{/g}の尖塔の輪郭や、クリスタルのドームの下で咲き乱れる庭園の香りや、惑星中を流れる小川の銀色のせせらぎを、お前はほとんどといっていいほど受け入れることはできないだろう。そしてこれらすべてが虚空のベルベットのドレープに、星のように輝くひとつの器に封じ込められているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Euch das zu erklären fühlt sich an, als würde man einem Vogel einen Lobgesang auf die Schönheit tiefer Gewässer und bunter Korallenwälder vorsingen, Elantach. Euer begrenztes Verständnis der Welt kann unmöglich die Konturen endloser {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}Phantomkristall{/g}-Türme begreifen, den berauschenden Duft eines Gartens, der unter einer Kristallkuppel blüht, oder das silberne Plätschern eines Bachs, der durch die ganze Welt verläuft. Und all das in einem einzigen Gefäß eingeschlossen, das wie ein Stern auf dem samtenen Vorhang der Leere glänzt."
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: "Euch das zu erklären fühlt sich an, als würde man einem Vogel einen Lobgesang auf die Schönheit tiefer Gewässer und bunter Korallenwälder vorsingen, Elantach. Euer begrenztes Verständnis der Welt kann unmöglich die Konturen endloser {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}Phantomkristall-{/g}Türme begreifen, den berauschenden Duft eines Gartens, der unter einer Kristallkuppel blüht, oder das silberne Plätschern eines Bachs, der durch die ganze Welt verläuft. Und all das in einem einzigen Gefäß eingeschlossen, das wie ein Stern auf dem samtenen Vorhang der Leere glänzt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je peux tenter de vous l'expliquer, elantach, mais vous êtes comme un oiseau à qui l'on chanterait un hymne à la beauté des eaux profondes et des forêts coralliennes. Votre compréhension limitée du monde est incapable d'appréhender la grandeur des innombrables tours en {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}moelle spectrale{/g}, l'odeur enivrante d'un jardin florissant sous un dôme de cristal, ou le chant cristallin d'un ruisseau qui traverse le monde entier. Tout cela est contenu dans un seul et même vaisseau qui brille telle une étoile sur la toile veloutée du cosmos. »
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux tenter de vous l'expliquer, elantach, mais vous êtes comme un oiseau à qui l'on chanterait un hymne à la beauté des eaux profondes et des forêts coralliennes. Votre compréhension limitée du monde est incapable d'appréhender la grandeur des innombrables tours en {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}moelle spectrale{/g}, l'odeur enivrante d'un jardin florissant sous un dôme de cristal, ou le chant cristallin d'un ruisseau qui traverse le monde entier. Tout cela est contenu dans un seul et même vaisseau qui brille telle une étoile sur la toile veloutée du cosmos. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sana bunu açıklamak, bir kuşa derin suların ve mercan ormanlarının güzelliğine dair methiyeler düzmekten farksız elantach. Sizin zihinlerinizin dünya algısı hâlihazırda sınırlı. Sonsuz {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}tayfkemik{/g} kulelerinin nasıl eğrilip büküldüğünü, bir kristal kubbeyi çiçeklerle bezeyen bir bahçenin baş döndürücü kokusunu ya da tüm dünyanın içinden geçen bir derenin gümüşi akıntısını algılaman pek olası değil. Hele ki tüm bunlar, uçsuzun kadife perdesinde yer edinmiş bir yıldız gibi parlayan tek bir gemide barınıyor."
languages.original_text: "Explaining it to you feels like singing a paean to the beauty of deep waters and coral forests to a bird, elantach. Your mind's limited understanding of the world can hardly contain the contours of endless {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}wraithbone{/g} spires, the intoxicating scent of a garden blooming under a dome of crystal, or the silver babbling of a brook that runs through the whole world. And all this encapsulated in a single vessel that shines like a star on the velvet drape of the void."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bunu açıklamak, bir kuşa derin suların ve mercan ormanlarının güzelliğine dair methiyeler düzmekten farksız elantach. Sizin zihinlerinizin dünya algısı hâlihazırda sınırlı. Sonsuz {g|Encyclopedia:Wraithbone}tayfkemik{/g} kulelerinin nasıl eğrilip büküldüğünü, bir kristal kubbeyi çiçeklerle bezeyen bir bahçenin baş döndürücü kokusunu ya da tüm dünyanın içinden geçen bir derenin gümüşi akıntısını algılaman pek olası değil. Ayrıca tüm bunlar, uçsuzun kadife perdesinde yer edinmiş bir yıldız gibi parlayan tek bir gemide barınıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
